def wait_until_identity_exists(self, identity): """ Waits until an identity exists. The waiter polls Amazon SES until the identity has been successfully verified or until it exceeds its maximum time.
:param identity: The identity to wait for. """ try: waiter = self.ses_client.get_waiter('identity_exists') logger.info("Waiting until %s exists.", identity) waiter.wait(Identities=[identity]) except WaiterError: logger.error("Waiting for identity %s failed or timed out.", identity) raise
